feeds.author: ProRider_Mike
feeds.title: My Journey to Master the Double Backflip
feeds.content: After weeks of practice, I finally landed my first double backflip in the new urban park! The feeling was incredible. Here's my step-by-step guide to mastering this advanced trick.

feeds.author: StreetStyle_Sarah
feeds.title: Creating the Perfect Trick Line
feeds.content: Spent the weekend designing the ultimate trick line through downtown. Combining rail grinds, air tricks, and street obstacles for maximum style points. Check out my route!

feeds.author: GrindMaster_Alex
feeds.title: Rail Grinding Tips from a Pro
feeds.content: Want to improve your rail grinding? Here are my top 5 tips for maintaining balance, building speed, and executing perfect grinds every time. Practice makes perfect!
